channel.title: lightning on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in lightning on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-28
item.description: Apple will reportedly allow iPhones to accept contactless payments (2 minute read) Apple may soon be rolling out a feature that will let small businesses accept payments using their iPhones without any extra hardware.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-22
item.description: In 2021, the Internet went for TikTok, space, and beyond (16 minute read) TikTok saw more traffic than Google in 2021.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-02
item.description: Google discontinues the Pixel 3A and 3A XL (2 minute read) Google has discontinued the Pixel 3A and 3A XL smartphones.
